metadata.name: The Lamb and the Children
metadata.description:
I took this photo in 2015 in a village in Turkey . New born lambs are best friends of children that lives in villages. When I went to this village to document the life in village, i heard voices of children and lambs. These voices came from a barn and when i walked through the door of the barn, I saw these children playing with the lambs. The sparkle of happiness in the eyes of the children impressed me a lot. I tried to reflect this happiness in my photo. I am happy to have taken such a beautiful and lovely photo. I named this photo "The Lamb and the Children". 

Photographer: Fatih Ã‡indemir.

Camera: Canon EOS 70D
Lens: Canon 24-105 mm
Location : Ankara / Turkey
Date : 08. 04 .2015
Dimensions: 4000*2666 300 dpi
Edition: 1/1
